cast.overview: A police raid in Detroit in 1967 results in one of the largest citizens' uprisings in the history of the United States.
cast.title: Detroit

details.biography:
Ephraim Manessah Sykes (born July 17, 1985) is an American actor. Sykes played the role of George Eacker in the Broadway musical Hamilton.

In December 2016, he played Seaweed J. Stubbs in NBC's live production of Hairspray Live!. In 2017, Sykes originated the role of David Ruffin in the musical Ain't Too Proud, a stage musical based on the life of The Temptations.
details.name: Ephraim Sykes
